title: How can I contact technician support and use my warranty?
content:
So the history is this:

I bought a pixel 3a from Amazon .de and 1 month ago the bottom speaker stopped working. I did the factory reset how I saw on the comunnity and nothing changed. I asked the community support what should I do and on their advice, I contact the seller trough Amazon platform.
The seller told me to contact 1:1 technician chat or call and if it s not working they will tell me all the details to send it back to repair/replace because my warranty is available.
They gave me a link but all of the steps are like a continuous loop because it s just taking me back to the beginning or to ask comunity.

Any help, please?
